long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Millions of people learn languages with Babbel â€” the app built by language learning experts























































Babbel Customizer is a Chrome extension designed to enhance your experience on the Babbel language learning platform. With this extension, you can adjust the brightness of the page to your liking, reducing eye strain in bright or dim environments. Additionally, you have the option to customize the background color with a selection of subtle, pleasant colors that can make your study sessions more visually comfortable and enjoyable.

Features:
Brightness Adjustment: Use the slider to fine-tune the brightness on the Babbel website, ranging from dimmer to brighter settings, allowing for a personalized display.
Background Color Options: Select from a variety of background colors, such as white, light blue, light green, or light pink, to change the appearance of Babbel's website.
Automatic Onet Page: After installation, the extension opens the Onet homepage in a new tab, introducing you to a popular Polish news website.
This simple yet functional tool lets you adjust the Babbel environment to suit your personal preferences and optimize your study experience.
